txt.en:
'The Orcs of Moria have stolen many beloved items from the bodies of those who have fallen defending Lothlórien from their assaults. I doubt not that many have been defiled or destroyed, but there must be some which can be recovered and brought to the families of the lost.

'Nardur-stazg is the chief encampment of the Orcs in Fanuidhol and the most dangerous to attack, but would you go there and recover what you may? I am sure some of the finest trophies have been sent there.

'Nardur-stazg lies to the north-west of here. Bring back any stolen belongings that you find, and you will be rewarded.'
'Your bravery is undeniable, [placeholder]. Not many would enter Nardur-stazg to recover trophies for sentimental Elves.'
'The Galadhrim will be grateful for any stolen belongings you can return to us.'
'Were you unable to recover the stolen belongings from Nardur-stazg?'
The Orcs of Moria have begun mustering in Fanuidhol in preparation to assault Lothlórien.
Collected crates of stolen belongings at Nardur-stazg ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect crates of stolen belongings at Nardur-stazg ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Nardur-stazg lies to the north-west from Talan Gwilith.\n\nMaeriel has asked you to enter Nardur-stazg and collect any stolen belongings you find there.
Bring the stolen belongings to Maeriel at Talan Gwilith
Maeriel is at Talan Gwilith, south-east of Nardur-stazg.\n\nYou should return to Maeriel with the stolen belongings you recovered.
